levels.settings.enableTooltips.name: Enable Tooltips
levels.settings.enableTooltips.hint: Show tooltips with top and bottom when hovering levels objects
levels.settings.tokenElevScale.name: Change token sized based on elevation
levels.settings.tokenElevScale.hint: Change size of tokens based on elevation of the controlled token
levels.settings.fogHiding.name: Advanced Fog of War
levels.settings.fogHiding.hint: Hide unexplored floors from the explored fog of war
levels.settings.lockElevation.name: Lock Elevation
levels.settings.lockElevation.hint: Prevent players from changing elevation from the token HUD. Keep in mind that if the player has permission to edit tokens they will be able to change it in the token config.
levels.settings.defaultLosHeight.name: Default Token Height
levels.settings.defaultLosHeight.hint: Height of a token (where the eyes of that creature are) in units. Default 6.
levels.settings.autoLOSHeight.name: Automatic token height
levels.settings.autoLOSHeight.hint: Automatically calculate token height based on size and scale. Will ignore ALL manual settings.
levels.settings.debugRaycast.name: DEBUG: Enable ray visualization
levels.settings.debugRaycast.hint: Show the 3D Sight rays (green visible, red not visible)
levels.settings.preciseLightOcclusion.hi: Removes light occlusion artefacts at the cost of performance

levels.tilecoonfig.rangeBottom.name: Height (Bottom)
levels.tilecoonfig.showIfAbove.name: Show even when below?
levels.tilecoonfig.showAboveRange.name: Max Elevation Difference
levels.tilecoonfig.isBasement.name: is Basement?
levels.tilecoonfig.noFogHide.name: Don't hide this tile in the Fog
levels.drawingconfig.hb.name: Height (Bottom)
levels.drawingconfig.ht.name: Height (Top)
levels.drawingconfig.range.name: Hole Range
levels.drawingconfig.elevatorFloors.name: Elevator Floors
levels.drawingconfig.elevatorFloors.hint: Define Floors as: elevation,name|elevation,name... - eg. 0,Ground Floor|10,First Floor...
levels.drawingconfig.isHole.name: Levels Drawing Mode
levels.drawingHud.title: Toggle Locked State for Stair
levels.tokenconfig.tokenHeight.name: Token LOS Height
levels.template.elevation.name: Elevation
levels.controls.main.name: Levels
levels.controls.levelsview.name: Enable Levels View/Placement
levels.controls.definelevels.name: Edit Levels
levels.controls.levelup.name: Up one Level
levels.controls.leveldown.name: Down one Level
levels.controls.levelsroof.name: Enable Levels Roofs View/Placement
levels.controls.levelshole.name: Place drawings as Stairs when enabled, place as holes when disabled
levels.controls.levelsclear.name: Clear Levels
levels.controls.placeOverhead.name: If enabled place tiles as overhead tiles 'inside' levels
levels.controls.setTemplateElevation.nam: Set elevation for next placed template

levels.dialog.define.title: Define Levels for this Scene
levels.dialog.elevator.title: Levels - Choose a Floor
levels.dialog.elevation.title: Set Elevation for next Template placement
